name: Web-sql
body:
### SQL Injection
* SQL-Injection is one of the top attacks for web applications.
* In this lab, students can get experience on exploiting SQL-Injection vulnerability.
* In a series of stepwise challenges, student will learn different SQL-Injection techniques. Useful skills for web analysis are also helpful.
* Try find out the vulnerabilities in the challenge website and make your evil inputs.


***
* To use this challenge sequence, please make sure you have set up the server [framework](https://github.com/nsslab-yin/SRCTF), then follow the instructions to import the challenge contents.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
